title: Add playable games accessible from game play button

requirements.text: Ensure the game play button opens a game selection interface that displays Flappy Bird along with other available games (Snake, Pong, Breakout)

quotes: on the gaame button when you click play make it so games like flappy bird and all that stuff ar avaliable to play

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the play button shows a list or grid of available games including Flappy Bird
All games (Flappy Bird, Snake, Pong, Breakout) are visible and selectable
Clicking on any game launches it in a playable state

requirements.text: Implement a fully playable Flappy Bird game with bird physics, pipe obstacles, score tracking, and game over detection
acceptanceCriteria: Bird responds to tap/click controls with realistic gravity and jump physics
Pipes spawn continuously and move from right to left
Score increments when bird passes through pipes
Game ends when bird collides with pipes or ground
Game can be restarted after game over

requirements.text: Integrate the Flappy Bird game template into GamePlayer component alongside existing game templates (Snake, Pong, Breakout)
acceptanceCriteria: Flappy Bird is available as a predefined game template in GamePlayer
Flappy Bird game loads correctly in the iframe player
High score tracking works for Flappy Bird
Game controls are responsive and smooth

constraints: Do not modify immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity.ts, useInternetIdentity.tsx, useActor.ts, main.tsx, or components/ui directory
Maintain single-actor backend architecture in backend/main.mo
Use existing GamePlayer component infrastructure for game rendering
nonGoals: Creating custom game editor for Flappy Bird
Integrating external game APIs or third-party game libraries
Adding social features like leaderboards or sharing

required: Pixel art flappy bird character sprite with yellow body and small wings (flappy-bird-sprite.dim_64x64.png)
Green pipe obstacle sprite in pixel art style for Flappy Bird game (pipe-sprite.dim_64x128.png)
